name: BotLibre
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bot libre
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bot Libre is a free open platform for bots and artificial intelligence for the web, mobile, social media, and IOT.

This chat bot answers questions about the Bot Libre platform on an Alexa device.
You can ask any question about Bot Libre, or say 'topics' for a list of topics.

You can create a bot and connect it to Facebook, Twitter, Skype, Telegram, Slack, Kik, WeChat, SMS, Alexa, email, and more.
You can create a bot to act as your own website avatar with 3D animation and speech.
You can create a bot to be your mobile virtual assitant for your own mobile app.
You can create a bot to provide customer service or technical support for your products or services.
You can create a bot to give advice.
You can create a bot to act as a stand-in for yourself.
You can create a bot to be your friend.

Bot Libre is developed and hosted by Paphus Solutions Inc.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
